memories.title: First Swipe Right on Bumble
memories.amirCaption: The 12-hour KB-KL road trip that led me to install Bumble. Best decision of that boring drive!
memories.ayunniCaption: Who knew swiping right would lead to someone who texts longer than my work reports? ğŸ˜

memories.title: WhatsApp Liberation Day
memories.amirCaption: 'Feels much lighter here compared to bumbleğŸ˜‚' - Finally escaped to WhatsApp! Long messages incoming... ğŸ¤£
memories.ayunniCaption: The day I discovered you're actually a storyteller disguised as a tech guy! Green flag confirmed âœ…

memories.title: The Great Spam Apology
memories.amirCaption: The day you apologized for 'spamming' WhatsApp and then sent the sweetest message about taking things slow.
memories.ayunniCaption: 'Hey, sorry spam whatsapp ğŸ˜…' But also... I'd love to meet u too. You have good vibes!

memories.title: The Long Text Revelation
memories.amirCaption: 'Again another sets of long texts ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£' Sorry, I can't help myself when talking to you!
memories.ayunniCaption: It's a green flag for me! But let's see how long you boleh consistent mcm ni ğŸ«£ğŸ˜ Spoiler: Still consistent!

memories.title: Late Night Sarawak Stories
memories.amirCaption: Sharing my childhood memories in Miri until 1 AM. From badminton with Awie to patung stories!
memories.ayunniCaption: The night I learned about patung, plantation life, and that you're actually not garang at all! 'U tak garang?'

memories.title: Kedey Kamek Planning at 2:47 AM
memories.amirCaption: 'Maybe kedey kamek?' The breakfast date we planned at 2:47 AM. Sarawakian approved restaurant for my Sarawakian approved girl.
memories.ayunniCaption: See you there! (But first, let me take things slow... I hope you don't mind ğŸ«£)

memories.title: ChatGPT's Dating Advice
memories.amirCaption: When ChatGPT became our relationship counselor! Movie dates for nervous first meetings - genius advice!
memories.ayunniCaption: 'Chatgpt ckp kan, if u r nervous to meet for the first time, we can watch movie. Sebab less interaction' But no romance movies - nanti awkward! ğŸ˜…

memories.title: The Morning Confession ğŸ’•
memories.amirCaption: The morning you bravely shared your feelings at 7:19 AM. My heart melted when I read 'Amir, i takut laa i suka u'.
memories.ayunniCaption: 'Pagi2 dah confess ğŸ˜­' But you said 'i like everything about you'... one step at a time together ğŸ™Œ

memories.title: Medical Checkup & Lunch Plans
memories.amirCaption: Planning our Kedey Kamek lunch while you had your annual checkup at Beacon. I was already not nervous anymore!
memories.ayunniCaption: U dah tak nervous ke? InshaAllah... but first, let me survive this medical checkup ğŸ˜­

memories.title: First Date: Hala Bala & Powerbank
memories.amirCaption: 'Believe me I'm more nervous than youğŸ˜‚' Our first movie at Kepong! You surprised me with a powerbank gift on our first date!
memories.ayunniCaption: 'Thanks for meeting up today, and sorry if i was super shy ğŸ™ƒ' Also, here's a powerbank for you! (Why did I do that? ğŸ˜‚)

memories.title: Movie Date Planning with ChatGPT
memories.amirCaption: Planning Superman movie at midnight! You asked if I could drive you home ğŸ˜Š
memories.ayunniCaption: 'ChatGPT said watch movie if nervous - less interaction!' But no romance movies, nanti awkward ğŸ˜…

memories.title: Superman & Bracelet Night
memories.amirCaption: 'You're so pretty tonightğŸ˜˜' Superman movie and I got you a bracelet! 'I'm in love tonightâ˜ºï¸'
memories.ayunniCaption: 'Thanks for getting the bracelet too ğŸ¤' Next time, let me treat you okay!

memories.title: One Month Anniversary
memories.amirCaption: Can't believe it's been a month already! Every day with you feels special.
memories.ayunniCaption: 'It's been exactly one month since we started talking. Thanks for making me feel seen, calm, and appreciated in ways i didnt expect ğŸ¤'

memories.title: Phone Wallpaper Reveal
memories.amirCaption: Showed my phone wallpaper of you eating mee kolok to my colleagues. 'I senang je tunjuk phone wallpaperğŸ˜‚'
memories.ayunniCaption: You actually made me your wallpaper! And shared fitness app data stories about the past...

memories.title: Official Boyfriend & Girlfriend
memories.amirCaption: 'And you're my girlfriend' - Finally said it out loud! No more wondering what we are.
memories.ayunniCaption: The night you called me your girlfriend for the first time. My heart did a little dance! ğŸ’•

memories.title: First Flowers Surprise
memories.amirCaption: 'When i look at the flowers i nmpk you' Surprised you after work with flowers!
memories.ayunniCaption: 'I didn't expect it at all' Thank you for the flowers ğŸ¤ You pandai betul eh!

memories.title: The Wallet Surprise
memories.amirCaption: From powerbank to wallet - you keep surprising me! 'I also ada jgk rasa sebak' when you give me gifts ğŸ¥º
memories.ayunniCaption: Another gift because... why not? You deserve nice things! Next time, let me know what else you need ğŸ˜Š

memories.title: Going Instagram Official
memories.amirCaption: 'Hey you're in my thoughts like every 15 min' The night you told your friend about us!
memories.ayunniCaption: 'Bangga eh i tunjuk gmbr you' Finally told Ad about you! You are so amazing today!
